description: Covered in coconut and sprinkles, these tasty white chocolate mud cake truffles will delight loved ones this Christmas.
name: Coconut Ice Mud Cake Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place mud cake in a large bowl. Using hands, break up cake and combine into a soft dough.

Using damp hands, roll mixture into 12 balls. Place chocolate in a microwavesafe bowl. Microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring occasionally, until melted and smooth, Tint with food colouring. Using 2 forks to hold a truffle, dip truffles, one at a time, in chocolate to coat, allowing excess chocolate to drip off. Place on prepared tray.
Top truffles with coconut and sprinkles. Allow to set. Serve.
